short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add live tweets to your sports streams on Hotstar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twickr brings you tweets from top Twitter accounts on the same screen as your live sports on Hotstar. The Twickr sidebar sits next to the live match screen and loads tweets in real-time from a curated list of Twitter accounts‚Äîofficial team accounts, journalists, fan channels, and more‚Äîenhancing your match experience with live commentary, reactions and insights.
